page.title: 06Hotels
page.content: The main business in Brockenhurst comes from hotels.They are spread all over the village.Tourists are very important.Here is a list of all the hotels in and around Brockenhurst: {Carey's Manor Hotel;Balmer Lawn {Hotel;New Park Hotel;Rose & Crown {Hotel,(Lyndhurst Road). {Cloud Hotel,(Meerut Road). {Water Splash Hotel,(The Rise). {Whitely Ridge Hotel,(Balmer Lawn Rd). {Forest Park Hotel;Rhinefield House {Hotel,(Rhinefield Road). {Fernlodge Hotel;Wide Lane Cottage {Hotel,(Sway Road).} Brockenhurst supports a lot of hotels. Without hotels Brockenhurst would lose a lot of business.They are a main source of revenue and provide the shops with more customers.
